slide.title: Bayzid, driver and owner of a bus, at the burn unit of DMCH yesterday. Criminals torched his bus, which was requisitioned by police, at Bangla Motor intersection Tuesday night. He jumped out of the burning vehicle but landed on his face. He cannot speak now. Photo: Anisur Rahman

The wife of Abu Mia, feeding him at the burn unit yesterday as the trucker is all bandaged and it is too painful for him to move his arms. Criminals on Tuesday night torched his cattle-laden truck at Sitakunda, Chittagong, killing seven cows and injuring his helper too. Photo: Anisur Rahman
